CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Text( HRCFSL_Next_PM_DT__c )),' ',Text(HRCFSL_Next_PM_DT__c) ) & IF( HRCFSL_Next_PM_DT__c < TODAY() ,' (Maintenance Overdue) ',' ' ) & IF(ISBLANK( Text(HRCFSL_Number_Open_WOs__c )),' ',' â€¢ Open WO' + "'s" +' ' & Text(HRCFSL_Number_Open_WOs__c) )
CustomField.label: Additional Information
